> It\'s the X-15

> 
> x-15 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Now to build a B-52 on top of it...

Yup right one have a cookie! I wonder how laggy adding a X-15 to that amazing B-52 replica would be? Now thinking of it would it be worth it, the thing only has around 1 minute or two of fuel and has to jettison both landing gear and canards to take off. But then again I wouldn\'t need those on a B-52.

NASA\'s U-2 variant, the ER-2.
